title: 7 ejected after skirmish between Pistons, Wolves
description: Five players and two coaches were ejected after a fight broke out in the second quarter in the Timberwolves' game against the Pistons on Sunday.

title: Source: Tush push ban has support in committee
description: At the league meetings this week in West Palm Beach, Florida, a source with direct knowledge told ESPN that the Green Bay Packers' proposal to ban the push sneak, popularly known as the tush push, has support within the NFL's competition committee.
author: Kalyn Kahler

title: Lee holds off Scheffler, McIlroy to edge PGA Tour thriller in Houston
description: Min Woo Lee held off a back-nine charge from Scottie Scheffler and an impressive finish from Rory McIlroy to claim a breakthrough PGA Tour title at the Texas Children’s Houston Open.

title: FA Cup hits and misses: What a week for electric Eze
description: Sky Sports' football writers analyse Saturday's FA Cup quarter-final action with Eberechi Eze and Nottingham Forest's deadly defensive duo drawing big praise.

title: Last shot at glory for 'legends'? Guardiola still burning with desire
description: Pep Guardiola still faces a huge Manchester City rebuild but clouds lift as they reach a seventh successive FA Cup semi-final, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.

title: 'His swagger is back' but Villa won't 'waste time' on Rashford future
description: Aston Villa loanee Marcus Rashford scored his first goals for Aston Villa in the FA Cup quarter-final win at Preston as he continues to show some of his old swagger.

title: Long: Martinsville victory just like old times for Denny Hamlin
description: 10 years after his last win at Martinsville, Denny Hamlin took the checkered flag Sunday.

title: After a bowl-like break, Utah basketball is back in action at new College Basketball Crown
description: The 16-team tournament gives the Utes a chance to win their part of a $500,000 NIL package and ‘any opportunity to keep competing, we’re going to take that chance’.
